tasks.title: Write JSON
tasks.code: s = struct('ok', true, 'items', { [1 2 3] }); fid = fopen('data.json','w'); fwrite(fid, jsonencode(s), 'char'); fclose(fid);

steps.title: script
steps.code: T = readtable('data.csv'); disp(height(T)); if any(strcmp('age', T.Properties.VariableNames)), disp(mean(T.age,'omitnan')); end

steps.title: script
steps.code: s = webread('https://httpbin.org/json'); if ~exist('out','dir'), mkdir out, end; fid=fopen('out/data.json','w'); fwrite(fid, jsonencode(s),'char'); fclose(fid); disp('saved to out/data.json')
